data.title: How to Support Michigan Public Health
data.text:
Make a Gift

You can make a gift online through the secure giving site.

Choose a Fund to Support

By Area of Interest

To learn more about how to support SPH, please click on an area of interest below.

Increase Your Gift via Matching Programs

Increase your gift to SPH through your company's matching gift program. Find out if your company has a matching gift policy on the University of Michigan matching gifts website.

Plan Your Legacy
